Layout

Grid system

Xtyle uses a grid system wichi you can use to organize content on the page. This system is separate in classes starting from .grid1 to .grid12. This classes are responsive, they will change depending on your screen resolution or device (try resize your browser window).

Always use this elements within the .grid class.
